description.message: Makes the Internet open and your data safe. Topnotch VPN from the creators of the famous ad blocker.

settings_referral_info.message: Invite your friends to join our ninja clan and get more free VPN traffic for a month. Receive 1 GB for each friend who signs up: they also get 1 GB extra for free! You can get 10 GB in total for free.

settings_referral_limit_reached.message: You've already received your 10 GB of free VPN traffic. But your friends can still get 1 GB of additional free VPN traffic if you invite them!

settings_webrtc_desc.message: WebRTC is a special program in most Internet browsers that can allow a third-party website to detect your real IP address and use it to identify you

settings_context_menus_title.message: Add AdGuard VPN item to the browser’s context menu

settings_help_us_improve_description.message: Allow AdGuard VPN to gather crash reports, technical and interaction data. This is anonymous.

settings_dns_desc.message: Domain Name System (DNS) is the internet's equivalent of a phone book. It maintains a directory of domain names and translates them to Internet Protocol (IP) addresses.

settings_dns_selector_default_desc.message: Automatically use default DNS servers when connected to the VPN

settings_dns_selector_adguard_desc.message: Removes ads and trackers from your device

settings_dns_selector_adguard_nonfilteri.message: Secure DNS with no activity logging (does not filter ads & trackers)

settings_dns_selector_adguard_family_des.message: AdGuard DNS + SafeSearch and adult content blocking

settings_dns_selector_google_desc.message: Free alternative DNS service by Google

settings_dns_selector_cisco_desc.message: DNS server that protects your device from malware

settings_dns_selector_quad9_desc.message: Free alternative DNS service with protection from phishing and spyware

settings_exclusions_remove_all_exclusion.message: Are you sure you want to continue? The entire list of exclusions will be removed.

settings_exclusion_general_description.message: AdGuard VPN is on everywhere except websites added to exclusions

settings_exclusion_selective_description.message: AdGuard VPN is on only for the websites added to exclusions

settings_exclusion_subdomains_text.message: You can add domains (e.g. google.com) or all subdomains (e.g. *.google.com)
